title: RollerCoaster Tycoon 2 [US] + Original RCT Scenarios
description:
=== RollerCoaster Tycoon 2 [US] + Original RCT Scenarios ===

ISO:		RollerCoaster Tycoon 2.iso [551 MB]
MD5:		FEE108E611291A27175D2A4193E35274
SHA1:		508F10609C062CA7421818D40BB82BC262DE2B87

=== DESCRIPTION ===
Stretch your imagination further to build bigger parks and higher coasters! Break ground and start from scratch, open the gates to a remarkable Six Flags park, or just create the most gut-wrenching roller coaster imaginable - now you can play your way! Choose and complete different scenarios accordingly to the experience and content you like. Satisfy the visitors by building various attractions and facilities. Wild new rides, exciting new themes, and improved easy-to-use building tools make creating the ultimate amusement park more fun than ever!

=== INSTALLATION ===
1) Burn or mount 'RollerCoaster Tycoon 2.iso' and install.

2) Browse to your installation folder. (Default: C:Program FilesInfogrames InteractiveRollerCoaster Tycoon 2)

3) Copy 'rct2.exe' from the 'Crack' folder to your installation folder, overwriting the existing file.

4) [OPTIONAL] Copy all files from the 'Original RCT Scenarios' folder to the 'Scenarios' folder where you installed RCT2. All the scenarios from the original RollerCoaster Tycoon Deluxe will now be playable in RCT2.

5) That's it! Just launch the game and play.

=== COMPATIBILITY TIPS ===
If you have difficulties getting the game to run on Windows Vista or later, right-click rct2.exe, go to Properties > Compatibility and check 'Disable visual themes' and 'Disable desktop composition'. Do NOT enable Windows 98/ME compatibility mode; this will cause the game to crash on launch. AMD Radeon users may need to use Catalyst drivers 13.4 or earlier.

=== SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS ===
OS:			Windows 98/Windows Me/2000/XP/Vista/7/8
Processor: 	Pentium II 300 MHz or equivalent
Memory: 	64 MB RAM
Hard Disk: 	100 MB free
CD-ROM: 	4x or higher
